#include<iostream>
#include<iomanip>
using namespace std;
#define mod(a) a<0?-a:a
float area(int *x,int* y,int n)
{   int j=n-1;
    float area=0;
	for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
	{  area+=0.5*(y[i]+y[j])*(x[j]-x[i]);
	   j=i;
	}	
	return mod(area);
}
int main()
{   int t;
    cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
	int n;
    cin>>n;
    int xcoor[n],ycoor[n];
	for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
	cin>>xcoor[i];
    for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
	cin>>ycoor[i];	   
	cout.setf(ios::fixed);
    cout<<setprecision(1)<<area(xcoor,ycoor,n)<<"\n";
    }
	
}
